page.title: 15School and community
page.content: Since 1983 the average capitation of Coads Green School to 1985 has been { {Â£850}per year.The parents and community over the same period have put in over{Â£3000}.The relationship between school and community is close and vital.The commputer used to type this information in was paid for with money raised through sponsorship. Parents come into the school to help with reading and the preparation of materials. The school is used on Sunday by the Methodist Chapel for their Sunday School.The local Bird Fanciers have held their shows in school. The P.T.A. involves the whole community in their activities the current project is by a self help scheme to provide a craft/activities room,office and store room to be completed in1986.
